oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Colonel Kirkpatrick and Senator William F. Knowland
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two men stand near a flag.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Flags; Interiors; Military uniforms; Soldiers
Kirkpatrick, Elmer E.; Knowland, William F. (William Fife), 1908-1974
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Senator Knowland of California was a member of the joint Senate-House Committee on Atomic Energy. See Oak Ridge Journal of December 12, 1946. A similar image appeared in the Oak Ridge Journal of December 19, 1946.
